about_the_game:
3 Last Chances is an Action RPG game with challenging combat and progression system that allows to create your own unique playstyle. You get 3 chances to replay a year, complete quests and find just the right method of weakening and overcoming the seemingly unbeatable final boss.

  • Replay the same year (50 weeks) up to 3 times, searching for a method to overcome the game's ultimate Boss. Repeated missions and dialogues can be skipped, with only new content being shown.
  • Acquire up to 56 abilities, each with 2 different upgrades. Unlock power-ups and equip weapons to become stronger and create your own, unique playstyle.
  • Challenge 20 Bosses, each with their unique attacks and mechanics.
  • Choices available to you and the game's ending depends on your decisions.
